changelog: Commented manifest to exclude mounting weapon components by default so script can restart while editing. Updated manifest dependencies to latest recommended server build. Added the following weapons: weapon_acidpackage, weapon_battlerifle, weapon_candycane, weapon_hackingdevice, weapon_metaldetector, weapon_pistolxm3, weapon_precisionrifle, weapon_railgunxm3, weapon_snowlauncher, weapon_stunrod, weapon_tacticalrifle, and the weapon_tecpistol from DLC updates.
